alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, Bay, northwestern Calhoun and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 302 PM EDT/202 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Chipley to near Panama City Beach. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Vernon, Chipley, Springfield, Hiland Park, Bradford, Alford, Wausau, Ebro, Moose Pond, Dirego Park, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Camps Head, Bahama Beach, Holmes Valley, Bennett and Porter Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
